import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Restaurante } from 'src/app/auth/interfaces/restaurante.interfaces'; import { SearchService } from 'src/app/auth/services/search.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private searchService: SearchService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} searchTerm!: string; searchCityTerm!: string; results: any[] = []; search() { this.results = []; this.searchService .getRestaurantesPorNombre(this.searchTerm) .subscribe((restaurantes: any) => { if (restaurantes.ok) { restaurantes.restaurante.forEach((element: Restaurante) => { this.results.push(element); }); } console.log('Resultados: ', this.results[0]); }); } }
